name: PEOW 3D VISUAL ARCHIVE
description:
MAC VERSION COMING SOON

What is this?

Browse through the complete collection of books released between 2012 - 2022 by the Swedish Publisher, PEOW. Highly accurate models, with book power rankings and behind the scenes commentary from the publishers. The P3DVA also includes a collection function, so you can see how big your peow collection is, or what books you still have missing if you a freak going for platinum. And no, it's not a traditional "visual novel" but there are no better words to describe this visual archive of novels.

LINKS

Music by Maxo
Get real peow books
peow /twitter / IG

UPDATES?
If enough people download this, we will be releasing some extra sections to show unreleased books, BIAO titles, and other rare releases that are not necessarily books.

CONTROLS
It says right when you start the game, but for reference
Q - Next book
E - Previous book
Left Shift - Zoom in
Right Click - Rotate book
Left Click - press button
